articles.title: Gun Control Live Updates: Supreme Court Ruling and Senate Vote
articles.description: The Senate is preparing for a final vote on a bipartisan gun safety bill, less than 12 hours after the Supreme Court ruled 6 to 3 to strike down New York’s gun law, likely limiting the ability of state and local governments to restrict guns outside the home.
articles.content: WASHINGTON The Supreme Court ruled on Thursday that Americans have a broad right to arm themselves in public, striking down a New York law that placed strict limits on carrying guns outside the home … [+8734 chars]

articles.title: Jan. 6 hearing: Trump told DOJ officials 'just say it was corrupt, and leave the rest up to me'
articles.description: The Jan. 6 committee's fifth hearing Thursday will feature testimony from three former DOJ officials who all threatened to resign over Trump's pressure.

articles.title: LGBTQ students would get new protections under Biden plan
articles.description: The rights of LGBTQ students would become enshrined in federal law and victims of campus sexual assault would gain new protections under new rules proposed by the Biden administration  on Thursday.

articles.title: 'This is a victory': smiling Zelenskiy promises EU membership, Russia defeat
articles.description: President Volodymyr Zelenskiy on Thursday declared the EU's move to accept Ukraine as a candidate for accession as a victory and promised not to rest until Russia's defeat and full membership had been secured.

articles.title: House Speaker Nancy Pelosi's husband Paul charged with DUI after May crash in California
articles.description: Paul Pelosi was charged with DUI with injury on Thursday after he was involved in a crash in late May. His BAC was .082%, according to officials.

articles.title: 6 killed after ‘Huey’ helicopter crashes in West Virginia
articles.description: The Bell UH-1B helicopter, known as a “Huey,” crashed around 5 p.m. on a rural roadway in Logan County, W.Va., according to the Federal Aviation Administration. It was giving a tour to enthusiasts of the aircraft.
